attributes.action: Protect Disability Benefits: Stop the Changes to PIP and Other Support Payments”
attributes.additional_details:
Many people rely on PIP and other benefits to cover essential costs like mobility aids, personal care, and daily living expenses. 
 The proposed reforms may make it harder for people to qualify for PIP 
	Mental and Physical Health Impact – Uncertainty and financial strain can lead to increased stress, anxiety, and worsening health conditions, making life even more difficult for disabled individuals.
	 The current benefits system already has issues with unfair assessments and appeals.
attributes.background:
– Halt any planned changes to pip & other benefits that could reduce support for vulnerable 
 those who rely on these benefits do not face cuts or increased barriers to support.
	Focus on making the system fairer, more accessible & efficient, rather than restricting eligibility or payments.
